replies.body:
tryndamere isnt even that op, darius, fiora, yi, ekko, akali
those are all more potent ban choices than tryn

no idea what elo you're in but diana and tryndamere are never picked or banned in my games. If I was riot I would give tryndamere the speed of rammus's powerball when using ult, his Q should remove CC and his W should be a stun instead of a slow. GG. {{summoner:6}}
Lol tryndamere is my perma ban, loses lane then proceeds to destroy every tower in the game, yeah nope
